sentences.en: A flexible pavement has a wearing surface which is often only 5 cm thick.
sentences.cn: 柔性路面的磨耗层往往只厚5厘米.

sentences.en: Fully - grown hookworms in the gut are 2 to 3 cm long.
sentences.cn: 在肠内发育成熟的钩虫长2--3厘米.

sentences.en: His height had increased by 2.5 cm.
It is a stainless steel tube about 2 cm in diameter.
sentences.cn: 它是直径约2厘米的不锈钢管.

sentences.en: No concrete road surface is thinner than 10 cm since any smaller thickness might break up.
sentences.cn: 混凝土路面不能薄于10厘米,因为再薄就可能断裂.

sentences.en: On a bright and clear day a 15 - cm helio can be seen at 50 km.
sentences.cn: 在明朗的晴天,15厘米大小的回照光在50公里处能看到.

sentences.en: Serr and Forde used 9 X 15 cm bags of tightly woven white cotton gabardine.
sentences.cn: 塞尔和福德应用了9X15厘米的密绩白色棉华达呢袋.

sentences.en: Some flukes can be as long as 1 cm.
sentences.cn: 有些吸虫可长达一厘米.

sentences.en: Tack them together with a 1.5 cm seam.
sentences.cn: 用1.5厘米的针脚将它们暂时缝上。

sentences.en: The benzylamine would have two peaks in the 3500 - 3100 cm - 1 region.
sentences.cn: 苄胺在3500～3100cm - 1范围有两个吸收峰.

sentences.en: The bolt has a diameter of 1 cm.
The total diameter of cavitation, if present, is less than 4 cm.
sentences.cn: 若出现空洞, 其直径总和小于4厘米.

sentences.en: The wild strawberry is 2 cm long.
UKChanges in the state of aggregation can lead to shifts of up to 10 cm - 1 .
sentences.cn: 物质聚集态的变化可能导致10厘米 -1 的频率位移.

sentences.en: We have found these bands in benzoylbenzoate to occur at 1789 cm - 1 and 1727 cm - 1.
sentences.cn: 我们发现苯甲酐的这些谱带在1789厘米 - 1(5.59微米)和1727厘米 - 1(5.79微米).

trans.tran_cn: centimeters 厘米，Cameroon 喀麦隆，Counter-Measures 反措施，Cruise Missile 巡航式导弹

trans.tran_en: a unit of length in the metric system equal to ten millimetres or one-hundredth of a meter
